sentences.english: The leader had joined the army much earlier after graduating from high school.
sentences.chinese: 這位班長自打高中畢業後就入伍了。

sentences.english: She needs to ask for the squad leader’s permission when she wants to go to the washroom.
sentences.chinese: 就連去洗手間，她都需要事先徵得班長的同意。

sentences.english: He (was selected ) the monitor when he was at school.
sentences.chinese: 他在上學時被選爲班長。

sentences.english: As a monitor, Bo Shi Wa is ready to help others.
sentences.chinese: 作爲班長，博士蛙樂意幫助別人。

sentences.english: She is the monitor in our class.
Each division should have a training corps for training squad leaders and platoon officers.
sentences.chinese: 一個師有教導隊，訓練班長和排幹部。

sentences.english: From grade one, I have been serving as the monitor and school group's committee all the time.
sentences.chinese: 從一年級起，我一直擔任着班長以及學校大隊委。

sentences.english: Iraq shares a table, before is always bullied by Iraq, has class leader to support luckily.
sentences.chinese: 伊拉克同桌，以前老被伊拉克欺負，幸好有班長撐腰。

sentences.english: Our monitor is a person who is pure in heart.
sentences.chinese: 我們的班長是個心地純潔的人。

sentences.english: Save a classmate, is the monitor obligation.
sentences.chinese: 少救一名共學，是班長的義務。

sentences.english: Our class was represented at the anniversary by the monitor.
sentences.chinese: 我班由班長代表出席慶典。

sentences.english: Their program to monitor, vice squad, the form of class members.
sentences.chinese: 他們在節目中以班長，副班長，班員的形式出現。

sentences.english: Their program to monitor, vice squad, the form of class members.
sentences.chinese: 他們在節目中以班長，副班長，班員的形式出現。

sentences.english: The monitor rapped the meeting to order.
sentences.chinese: 班長啪啪敲擊宣佈開會。

sentences.english: To the teacher's suprise, no one volunteered for position of monitor.
sentences.chinese: 讓老師喫驚的是，沒有人自願當班長。

definition: senior female fellow student or apprentice/daughter (older than oneself) of one's teacher
to study at the same school/fellow student/classmate/CL:位[wei4],個|个[ge4]
